title: Resources To Prepare For Flu, Covid-19, And Rsv
content:
Testing
– Tests, some of which can be used at home, can quickly detect these respiratory viruses so patients don't delay treatment and other actions that can protect their family, friends, and coworkers.
Common-sense measures
– Other tools like masking, physical distancing, washing hands, and improving airflow in the places where people live and work can provide an additional layer of protection.
